segments.text: May I speak to Mr . Baker ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid he's not in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you ask him to call me collect when he ’ s back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . May I ask who ’ s calling , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , this is Cindy Wang of A & B Trading Company in New York .
segments.speaker: S1
